outputs.output_descr: The purpose of this project is to enhance the capacity of CBOs/ NGOs to execute projects that falls within the focal areas of GEF (Land Degradation, Climate Change, Biodiversity Conservation, international water, POPs) with the intention of attainting both global environmental benefits and  local community livelihood   diversification through community initiatives.
